features.title: Key Reasons to Choose QueuePilot

feature1.title: Optimized Patient Flow
feature1.description: Dramatically reduce wait times and improve overall operational efficiency with real-time queue visibility for proactive patient flow management.

feature2.title: Enhanced Experience for All
feature2.description: Intuitive UI for staff and doctors, plus a public display keeping patients informed, reducing anxiety and improving their overall clinic experience.

feature3.title: Comprehensive Management
feature3.description: From patient registration to managing doctors, specialties, offices, and public display ads—all key clinic operations in one platform.

feature4.title: Insightful Reporting
feature4.description: Access detailed reports and statistics on clinic performance, wait times, and occupancy by doctor/specialty to make informed decisions.

feature5.title: Multilingual Support
feature5.description: Available in Spanish (default) and English, facilitating adoption in diverse environments and improving communication.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Efficiency
howItWorks.subtitle: See how QueuePilot manages the patient journey.

step1.title: 1. Easy Registration
step1.description: Patients register at reception. The system assigns them 'Waiting' status and a queue position for the selected doctor.

step2.title: 2. Informed Waiting & Calling
step2.description: Patients see their turn on public displays. Doctors call patients, changing status to 'Calling', which is shown on the display.

step3.title: 3. Consultation & Completion
step3.description: After consultation, the doctor marks status 'Completed'. Data is logged for analytics. No-shows/cancellations are also managed.
